error.notexist: I'm sorry, but it appears that action does not exist.
error.unknown: I encountered an unknown error while trying to process that action.
error.disabled: The module that action is tied to ({}) is disabled.

success.title: Forum Account Created!
success.description:
Your forum account has been created! Your infomation to log in is below.
Please change the provided email address and password once you log in!

alreadyexists.title: Forum Account Creation Failed
alreadyexists.description: You already have a forum account. Did you forget your email?

error.title: Forum Account Creation Failed
error.description:
Something went wrong.. somewhere
We've logged the error and will investigate.
